Key Match Events: Zach Edey played his third NBA game against the undefeated Orlando Magic.
Edey scored seven points and grabbed one rebound in 13 minutes of play.
Edey committed four personal fouls, which limited his playing time.
Santi Aldama led the Grizzlies off the bench with 22 points.
Jay Huff added 18 points while Ja Morant contributed 16 points.
Post-Match Reflections: Taylor Jenkins commented on Edey's mindset, stating that Edey is learning a lot and will improve over time.
